metadata.synopsis: Gortash calls out to the player to talk about their approach to the Netherbrain. If the player just runs past him towards the Netherbrain, he get's a bit salty.

0.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
0.text: Without my Netherstone, you don't stand a chance. Come here.

1.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
1.text: This way. Quickly. We need to talk.
